## EventEmitter.removeAllListeners() method

Removes all listeners, or those of the specified eventName.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeAllListeners(eventName?: string | symbol): this;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  eventName | string \| symbol |  |
